content: water lily granny square introduction thank you for selecting my water lily granny square pattern - the perfect addition to the blanket i hope that working on the granny square brings you a lot of joy i tried making all of the instructions clear and understandable but in case of any doubts feel free to dm me have fun and of course check out my other products at madebylisek etsy com you can also follow my instagram @madeby__lisek to get all the latest updates and behind-the- scenes photos materials time 30 min - 1 h this tutorial difficulty 3/5 yarn / rope crochet hook scissors us terms suggestions of colors and hook sizes description of yarn fibre 85% cotton | 15% polyester thickness worsted/aran yardage/meterage 246 yds | 225m grams 250g final size width 15 cm / 5 9 in material yarnart macrame height 15 cm / 5 9 in cotton 788 - 2mm hook 3 5 mm about me hi i m anna and crocheting has been my hobby for the last 3 years this year my friends have finally convinced me to try and open a shop i m very excited about the new possibilities as crocheting is the complete opposite of my day-to-day job 2 water lily granny square symbols abbreviations chain - chain tc - treble_crochet ij - invisible join* slip_stitch - slip_stitch tlo - third loop only* increase - increase ex increase double_crochet - increase single_crochet - single_crochet mc - magic_ring with double_crochet increase single_crochet - increase with single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet fptc - front-post treble_crochet blo - back loop only* tc3tcluster - 3 tc together *described on the last page written pattern graph 1 - flower - yellow part round 0 mc round 1 chain single_crochet 5 total 5 round 2 increase single_crochet blo x5 slip_stitch blo turn total 10 stamen - yellow part note petals are made in front loops of base round without changing the yarn and continue for entire spiral of front loops ws is facing up for the petals *chain 4 turn slip_stitch 3 in each chain slip_stitch flo to the base stitch slip_stitch flo to the next stitches x2* repeat from * until the end of the spiral total 9 stamens graph 2 - flower base- white part attach the new yarn to the third loop only of the stitch of round 2 round 3 single_crochet tlo chain as a first double_crochet double_crochet tlo in the same stitch increase double_crochet tlo x 9 slip_stitch blo turn total 20 petals - white part note petals are made in front loops of base round 3 without changing the yarn and continue in the back loop of round 2 ws is facing up for the petals *chain 3 tc3tcluster chain 3 slip_stitch to the back of first chain chain 3 slip_stitch flo to the base stitch of round 3 slip_stitch flo to the next stitches x2* repeat from * until the end of round 3 to move to round 2 please treat
